General.Name: Revelstone Capital Acquisition Corp. Warrant
General.Description: Revelstone Capital Acquisition Corp. focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to pursue prospective targets in the consumer, media, and/or technology markets. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Irvine, California.
General.Address: 14350 Myford Road, Irvine, CA, United States, 92606
